message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a competitive offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above your new offer. I'm willing to pay $860000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $860000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer $880000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above your new offer. I'm willing to pay $870000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
